Text: Is online on this game???

Hehe. On Windows XP (and thus DX9) this game gives about 5 FPS with a hardware config: C2D 6600 @ 2.7 GHz/core, 2 Gb RAM, 640Mb GeForce 8800 GTS.
*might* be better with DX10, though.
..okay, it's not at all bad at maximum settings IF you turn off antialiasing.

Don't forget to do the dx9 tricks in the CVAR config files to get DX10 eye candy in DX9 XP.  For more info, here are instructions:

Go to your game folder, go to Crysis/Game/Config/CVarGroups

For EACH config file, open it in notepad and take the first section BEFORE the [1], which in the sys_spec_full.cfg file would be these settings:

sys_spec_ObjectDetail=4
sys_spec_Shading=4
sys_spec_VolumetricEffects=4
sys_spec_Shadows=4
sys_spec_Texture=4
sys_spec_Physics=4
sys_spec_PostProcessing=4
sys_spec_Particles=4
sys_spec_Sound=4
sys_spec_Water=4
sys_spec_GameEffects=4

and overwrite the [3] section with those values.  Do that inside EACH of the cfg files in that folder.  Then set all your settings to High in game and BLAMBOO!  You have DX10 Very High settings while under XP.  Yay!  Turn off anti-aliasing and go to about 1024x768 and you have 20-30fps with dx10-like eye candy.  :)  Enjoy.

I fixed the problem i had with Norman blocking the Keygen and now everything works fine.

This is what i did to get the game working:

1. Extracted a random rzr-crys files with WinRar. (They dont look like files that can be extracted but just use winrar archive and then extract it)

2. Mounted the image with Deamon tools. (the file looks like a winrar icon by default)

3. Started the install and when i was prompted to  enter a CD-key i used the Key generator in the Razor1911 folder to get a random CD-key. (My Anti-virus program blocked the KG at first but i just told it to allow that .exe and i was good to go)

4. Installed the game and copied the crack from Razor1911 folder and overwrote the file in the game directory.

5. Clicked Play :D

Im sure most of you know how this works but in case there are any beginners out there who cant figure this out maybe this will help you :)
